templates.description: Passbolt is a free and open source password manager designed for collaboration. With Passbolt you can securely generate, store, manage and monitor your team credentials. Get access to all of your logins and passwords from multiple browsers or even your mobile phone.
templates.name: Passbolt
templates.title: Passbolt

Check our Github page: https://github.com/pi-hosted/pi-hosted

Pre-installation script must be RAN before you install: wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pi-hosted/pi-hosted/master/tools/rpi_docker_monitor.sh | bash
